general.name: ccw-coordinator
general.description: Command orchestration tool - analyze requirements, recommend chain, execute sequentially with state persistence

general.name: ccw
general.description: Main workflow orchestrator - analyze intent, select workflow, execute command chain in main process

general.name: cli-init
general.description: Generate .gemini/ and .qwen/ config directories with settings.json and ignore files based on workspace technology detection

general.name: issue:discover-by-prompt
general.description: Discover issues from user prompt with Gemini-planned iterative multi-agent exploration. Uses ACE semantic search for context gathering and supports cross-module comparison (e.g., frontend vs backend API contracts).

general.name: issue:discover
general.description: Discover potential issues from multiple perspectives (bug, UX, test, quality, security, performance, maintainability, best-practices) using CLI explore. Supports Exa external research for security and best-practices perspectives.

general.name: new
general.description: Create structured issue from GitHub URL or text description

general.name: queue
general.description: Form execution queue from bound solutions using issue-queue-agent (solution-level)

general.name: clean
general.description: Intelligent code cleanup with mainline detection, stale artifact discovery, and safe execution

general.name: debug-with-file
general.description: Interactive hypothesis-driven debugging with documented exploration, understanding evolution, and Gemini-assisted correction

general.name: init
general.description: Initialize project-level state with intelligent project analysis using cli-explore-agent

general.name: list
general.description: List all workflow sessions with status filtering, shows session metadata and progress information

general.name: solidify
general.description: Crystallize session learnings and user-defined constraints into permanent project guidelines

general.name: start
general.description: Discover existing sessions or start new workflow session with intelligent session management and conflict detection

general.name: animation-extract
general.description: Extract animation and transition patterns from prompt inference and image references for design system documentation

general.name: explore-auto
general.description: Interactive exploratory UI design workflow with style-centric batch generation, creates design variants from prompts/images with parallel execution and user selection

general.name: imitate-auto
general.description: UI design workflow with direct code/image input for design token extraction and prototype generation

general.name: layout-extract
general.description: Extract structural layout information from reference images or text prompts using Claude analysis with variant generation or refinement mode

general.name: style-extract
general.description: Extract design style from reference images or text prompts using Claude analysis with variant generation or refinement mode

analysis.name: codex-review
analysis.description: Interactive code review using Codex CLI via ccw endpoint with configurable review target, model, and custom instructions

analysis.name: analyze-with-file
analysis.description: Interactive collaborative analysis with documented discussions, CLI-assisted exploration, and evolving understanding

planning.name: convert-to-plan
planning.description: Convert planning artifacts (lite-plan, workflow session, markdown) to issue solutions

planning.name: from-brainstorm
planning.description: Convert brainstorm session ideas into issue with executable solution for parallel-dev-cycle

planning.name: plan
planning.description: Batch plan issue resolution using issue-plan-agent (explore + plan closed-loop)

planning.name: brainstorm-with-file
planning.description: Interactive brainstorming with multi-CLI collaboration, idea expansion, and documented thought evolution

planning.name: workflow:ui-design:codify-style
planning.description: Orchestrator to extract styles from code and generate shareable reference package with preview (automatic file discovery)

planning.name: design-sync
planning.description: Synchronize finalized design system references to brainstorming artifacts, preparing them for /workflow-plan consumption

planning.name: workflow:ui-design:import-from-code
planning.description: Import design system from code files (CSS/JS/HTML/SCSS) with automatic file discovery and parallel agent analysis

planning.name: workflow:ui-design:reference-page-generator
planning.description: Generate multi-component reference pages and documentation from design run extraction

implementation.name: execute
implementation.description: Execute queue with DAG-based parallel orchestration (one commit per solution)

implementation.name: generate
implementation.description: Assemble UI prototypes by combining layout templates with design tokens (default animation support), pure assembler without new content generation

implementation.name: unified-execute-with-file
implementation.description: Universal execution engine for consuming any planning/brainstorm/analysis output with minimal progress tracking, multi-agent coordination, and incremental execution

documentation.name: style-skill-memory
documentation.description: Generate SKILL memory package from style reference for easy loading and consistent design system usage

session-management.name: complete
session-management.description: Mark active workflow session as complete, archive with lessons learned, update manifest, remove active flag

session-management.name: resume
session-management.description: Resume the most recently paused workflow session with automatic session discovery and status update
